amendment.description: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part B of House Report 116-366 to require the Administrator of the EPA to consult with the FAA in addition to representatives of state and local building and fire code enforcement jurisdictions when issuing guidance on minimizing the use of firefighting foam.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part B of House Report 116-366 to require the Administrator of the EPA to consult with the FAA in addition to representatives of state and local building and fire code enforcement jurisdictions when issuing guidance on minimizing the use of firefighting foam.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Woodall amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Woodall.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Woodall amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
